title: Top 10 End Times News - August Week 1
content:
1. Global Push for Central Bank Digital Currencies Accelerates – August 4, 2025
    Read on WSJ
    Relation to Bible Prophecy: Revelation 13 describes a system where no one can buy or sell without the mark. Digital currencies may enable this system.
  2. Jerusalem Tensions Rise After Temple Mount Clashes – August 5, 2025
    Read on Jerusalem Post
    Relation to Bible Prophecy: Zechariah 12:3 prophesies Jerusalem becoming a burdensome stone for all nations — this escalation aligns with end-time tensions.
  3. Pope Urges Global Religious Unity at Interfaith Summit – August 3, 2025
    Read on CNN
    Relation to Bible Prophecy: Revelation 17 warns of a one-world religious system — events like these may lay the foundation.
  4. World Economic Forum Calls for Global Crisis ID – August 2, 2025
    Read on Fox News
    Relation to Bible Prophecy: A global ID system echoes Revelation’s warnings about worldwide control mechanisms.
  5. Iran Warns of War If Israel Attacks Nuclear Sites – August 4, 2025
    Read on Times of Israel
    Relation to Bible Prophecy: Ezekiel 38-39 speaks of a major war involving Iran — this may be part of that buildup.
  6. UN Chief Says 'Only Global Government Can Stop Chaos' – August 1, 2025
    Read on NY Times
    Relation to Bible Prophecy: Daniel 7 and Revelation 13 speak of a coming global ruler — cries for unity may prepare the way.
  7. Europe Launches 'Green Pass 2.0' for All Citizens – August 5, 2025
    Read on BBC
    Relation to Bible Prophecy: Increasing digital tracking aligns with the control system described in Revelation.
  8. Major Famine Predicted in Africa Amid Global Food Crisis – August 4, 2025
    Read on CNN
    Relation to Bible Prophecy: Revelation 6 speaks of famine as a sign of the end times — this may be an early indicator.
  9. AI Replaces Judges in Pilot Court System in China – August 2, 2025
    Read on BBC
    Relation to Bible Prophecy: Revelation 13 suggests an all-seeing authority — AI may enable global surveillance and enforcement.
  10. U.S. Churches Report Mass Decline as Youth Leave Faith – August 3, 2025
    Read on Fox News
    Relation to Bible Prophecy: 2 Thessalonians 2:3 speaks of a falling away before the Antichrist is revealed. This may be part of that apostasy.
